# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The view’s background color.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundColor: UIColor { get set }
```

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundColor: NSColor { get set }
```

## Discussion

A view’s background is the area displayed to either side of a PDF document’s pages. The background also appears between pages when page breaks are enabled. The default color is a 50% gray.

## Setting Background Color

- **takeBackgroundColorFrom(_:)**: Sets the view’s background color to the specified color.
